file_name.description: The name of the image file.

id.description: The unique identifier of the image.

src.description: The URL or path to access the image file.

width.description: The width of the image in pixels.

height.description: The height of the image in pixels.

media_type.description: The type of media file, e.g., image/jpeg, image/png, etc.

avg_color.description: The average color of the image.

has_alpha.description: Boolean indicating if the image has an alpha channel.
